div.p: FHIR Connectathon 21 - Terminology Services - Subsumes - SNOMED - OK - POST - Coding - XML

title.value: FHIR Connectathon 21 - Terminology Services - Subsumes - SNOMED - OK - POST - Coding - XML

description.value: CodeSystem $subsumes tests against known SNOMED codes where the expected outcome is a successful response with a valid outcome code value. All $subsumes operations are performed using the FHIR Operation Framework HTTP POST method with Parameters of system, codingA and codingB.

Subsumes test for SNOMED system and code using HTTP POST with system, codingA and codingB parameters; 3738000 (viral hepatitis) subsumed-by 235856003(disorder of the liver). Expected response is 200 (OK) with a Parameters payload containing the outcome code subsumed-by.
CodeSystem $subsumes operation for SNOMED system and code for outcome of subsumed-by.
Confirm that the returned HTTP status is 200(OK).
Confirm that the returned format is XML.
Confirm that the returned resource type is Parameters.
Confirm that the returned Parameters resource type conforms the base FHIR specification.
Confirm that the returned Parameters resource contains the expected parameter name with value of outcome.
Confirm that the returned Parameters resource contains the expected parameter valueCode with value of subsumed-by.

Subsumes test for SNOMED system and code using HTTP POST with system, codingA and codingB parameters; 235856003(disorder of the liver) subsumes 3738000 (viral hepatitis). Expected response is 200 (OK) with a Parameters payload containing the outcome code subsumes.
CodeSystem $subsumes operation for SNOMED system and code for outcome of subsumes.
Confirm that the returned HTTP status is 200(OK).
Confirm that the returned format is XML.
Confirm that the returned resource type is Parameters.
Confirm that the returned Parameters resource type conforms the base FHIR specification.
Confirm that the returned Parameters resource contains the expected parameter name with value of outcome.
Confirm that the returned Parameters resource contains the expected parameter valueCode with value of subsumes.

Subsumes test for SNOMED system and code using HTTP POST with system, codingA and codingB parameters; 399211009 (History of myocardial infarction) is not subsumed by 22298006 (Myocardial infarction). Expected response is 200 (OK) with a Parameters payload containing the outcome code not-subsumed.
CodeSystem $subsumes operation for SNOMED system and code for outcome of not-subsumed.
Confirm that the returned HTTP status is 200(OK).
Confirm that the returned format is XML.
Confirm that the returned resource type is Parameters.
Confirm that the returned Parameters resource type conforms the base FHIR specification.
Confirm that the returned Parameters resource contains the expected parameter name with value of outcome.
Confirm that the returned Parameters resource contains the expected parameter valueCode with value of not-subsumed.

Subsumes test for SNOMED system and code using HTTP POST with system, codingA and codingB parameters; 399211009 (History of myocardial infarction) is equivalent to 399211009 (History of myocardial infarction). Expected response is 200 (OK) with a Parameters payload containing the outcome code equivalent.
CodeSystem $subsumes operation for SNOMED system and code for outcome of equivalent.
Confirm that the returned HTTP status is 200(OK).
Confirm that the returned format is XML.
Confirm that the returned resource type is Parameters.
Confirm that the returned Parameters resource type conforms the base FHIR specification.
Confirm that the returned Parameters resource contains the expected parameter name with value of outcome.
Confirm that the returned Parameters resource contains the expected parameter valueCode with value of equivalent.
